detail_desc: Chinos in washed cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.

Short dress in jersey with glitter. V-neck with a wrapover and draping, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
Leotard in glossy jersey with a print motif, 3/4-length sleeves, a glittery elastic waistband and a skirt in two layers of tulle. Detachable wings at the back.
Soft pile fancy dress hat in the shape of a unicorn with padding, embroidery, sewn-on ears and a sewn-on horn. Hook and loop fastener at the front. Lined. Polyester padding.
Top in soft slub jersey made from a linen and cotton blend with an opening and button at the back of the neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a seam and flounce at the hem.
Top in soft slub jersey made from a linen and cotton blend with an opening and button at the back of the neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a seam and flounce at the hem.
Polo-neck top in a soft, brushed viscose blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Polo-neck top in a soft, brushed viscose blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Polo-neck top in a soft, brushed viscose blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Top in a textured-knit cotton blend with a round neckline, decorative buttons down the back and long, wide, cuffed sleeves.

Blouse in woven fabric with inset lace trims, a small, frilled collar and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Pin-tucks at the back, frill trims over the shoulders and long sleeves with narrow, lace-embroidered, buttoned cuffs.

Ankle-length trousers in twill made from a cotton and linen blend. High waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt, fly with visible buttons, welt side pockets and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem.
Top in UV-protective fabric with a print motif on the front, stand-up collar and short raglan sleeves. Slightly longer at the back. UPF 50.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif and bow on the front, a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a shirt in a cotton weave, bow tie, and a pair of trousers woven in a linen blend. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back. Trousers with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with fasteners and detachable braces.
Vest tops in organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Vest tops in organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Vest tops in organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Fully lined sports swimsuit in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back, opening at the back and mesh sections.
Padded jacket in a quilted weave with a detachable hood with a contrasting colour lining and stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard, front pockets and elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Jumpsuit in sequined jersey containing glittery threads with a wrapover, draped bodice, long sleeves, elasticated seam at the waist and straight, wide legs.
Top in sequin-embroidered mesh with a stand-up collar and long sleeves. Jersey lining.
Vest top in sequin-embroidered mesh with a deep neckline front and back. Jersey lining.
Short dress in washed, stretch denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and chest pockets. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt.
Short dress in washed, stretch denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and chest pockets. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt.
Trousers in a viscose and linen weave with a high, elasticated paper bag waist, detachable tie belt, side pockets and tapered legs.
Trousers in a viscose and linen weave with a high, elasticated paper bag waist, detachable tie belt, side pockets and tapered legs.
Dress in a patterned jacquard weave containing glittery threads. Short cap sleeves, buttons at the back, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined.
Blouse in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a gathered yoke on the shoulders and at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Blouse in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a gathered yoke on the shoulders and at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Longer-style jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels and welt front pockets with a flap. Lined.

Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and gathered yoke at the back. Decorative gathers at the shoulders and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and gathered yoke at the back. Decorative gathers at the shoulders and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a waist panel.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a waist panel.
Sleeveless sports tops in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and twisted seams.
Short tunic in a viscose weave with a V-neck opening at the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Unlined.
